text: Abwehr was the German military intelligence for the German armed forces called Reichswehr and Wehrmacht. It was formed in 1920 and acted to 1945 during all the World War II.Holmes, Richard (2009). The Oxford Companion to Military History. Oxford; New York: Oxford University Press. == References == Category:German intelligence agencies Category:Weimar Republic Category:Nazi Germany Category:World War II
title: Abwehr
